verses.roman:
nīlācale prabhu-saha prathama milana
sei bhakta-gaṇera ebe kariye gaṇana

synonyms: nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; prabhu-saha—with the Lord; prathama—first; milana—meeting; sei—that; bhakta-gaṇera—of the devotees; ebe—now; kariye—I do; gaṇana—count.
translation: Now let me enumerate the devotees of Bengal who first came to see the Lord at Jagannātha Purī.
